choices.answer: Connects the bridge to the thesis
The opening line or lines of an essay, article, or story.
An attractive object offered by advertisers.

questions.question: The HOOK is named for its ability to catch a reader's attention.
A writer is often judged within the first few sentences, so a good hook is very important.
What do we call sentences that lead a reader from the hook to the thesis statement?
The introduction to an essay should include:
An introduction paragraph without a thesis is incomplete.
A thesis statement should be how many sentences?
A quote can be used as a hook.
Which of the following examples would make a good "open-ended question" hook?

choices.answer: Do you like Chickfila or Bojangles?
Do you agree or disagree that the driving age should be kept at 16?
Should we require students to volunteer in order to receive their diplomas?
How many times must a bad thing happen for society to start making changes?

questions.question: Which of the following examples would be considered a close-ended question? (multiple answers)

choices.answer: Do you think winning is everything?
How can we create a safer environment for future generations?
Do actions speak louder than words?
What can we do to protect wildlife?

questions.question: Which of the following examples would make a good "definition" hook?

choices.answer: Mama always said, "stupid is as stupid does."
Merriam-Webster defines success as "a favorable or desired outcome."
My teacher told me the definition of a growth mindset the other day.
Good friends are a dime a dozen.

questions.question: Which of the following examples shows an example of an interesting fact used as a hook?

choices.answer: If you earned $5000 a day for 547 years you still wouldn't be a billionaire
Every student who has ever eaten a school lunch has found it unappealing.
It's impossible to find true friends in this day and age.

questions.question: Which of the following examples would make a good "quote" hook?

choices.answer: 70% of students don't get enough sleep.
"The truth is found when men are free to pursue it." -Franklin Roosevelt
My friend told me to shut up once and it hurt my feelings.
"What is the prompt again?" I asked myself as I started writing.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the bridge?

choices.answer: To connect the thesis to the body paragraphs
To get you to grandmother's house
To connect the hook to the thesis
To connect the thesis to the conclusion

questions.question: Correct/Incorrect? We should keep the driving age at 16 because teens need independence & families need their help
Correct/Incorrect: I agree because we need school and it's fun.
Correct/Incorrect: Students should volunteer. It is a great experience. It also looks good on college applications.
Correct/Incorrect? We need to have a 4 day week because it will save schools money & it will give students time.
Correct/Incorrect? I think working alone is better because I can get work done at my own pace & I know I'll do it right
